answers.answer: Generally when bowel problems persist a probiotic can be very helpful the 2 most beneficial products are a bit pricey.  The one is Align and can be purchased at Wal-Mart (around $30.00 for 1 month).  The second product is Dr. Mercolas Probiotic Packs which can be purchased in Health food stores or online for around $35.00 per month. You could also try the probiotic products sold at you local pharmacy or vitamin stores.  Another suggestion is to have your son eat small meals thought the day instead of large meals all at once.  many fruits and vegetables, low in dairy and wheat products.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Get his stool tested for worms, blood sugar for diabetes and hyperthyroidism and consult a gastroenterologist to rule out food intolerance such as celiac, lactose, to citrus fruits, tomatoes etc. IBS and Crohn’s should also be ruled out.Hope this helps. Take care!
